QuestData.Title: Adventurers Wanted: Chromie's Call
QuestData.Description: Chromie is seeking veteran adventurers to embark on expeditions through time and space.$b$bThis is your opportunity to experience the legendary adventures of the past--today!$b$bSpeak with Chromie near the Stormwind Embassy for more information.
QuestData.RewardText: I'm glad you made it, $n! Something tells me that your future is waiting for you in the past!
